#Québec #Montréal 
#CoVid19 #Vaccine 

08 April 2021
CoVid19 -- Vaccine 
Update 

Astra-Zeneca Vaccine risks
The facts 
20 million vaccines have been given 
79 cases of blood clotting have been reported 

The risk of blood clotting as a side-effect of the Astra-Zeneca Vaccine https://t.co/lvinPIr7j7
